name: Dreams (itch) (tobi1577)
description:
My first game jam game, where you play in your Dreams. Control of your body is not what it used to do, so make sure you plan your moves accordingly.

Post Game Jam upgrades:
 - Fixed bug that caused the game to soft lock if you failed certain tutorial levels
 - Added Tutorial Skip button
 - Added title screen
 - Added challenge mode
 - Added time indicator with extra visuals
 - Added hit animation
